titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to preclude the Committee on Rules from reporting any rule or order waiving the applicability of the germaneness requirement to any emergency supplemental appropriation for a natural disaster.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 9/23/1993--Introduced. Amends rule XI of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit the Committee on Rules from reporting any rule or order waiving the prohibition against considering nongermane amendments to any emergency supplemental appropriation for a natural disaster.
